caption:
• HOW TO ANIMATE YOUR KIDS DRAWINGS • 

Like 🫶 and comment ANIMATE and I’ll dm you the link for the website I use to animate the kids drawings!
. 
This is an all time favourite project time activity with my bigs, and now Miss 6 has been exploring it and loving it too. It’s such an easy to use website and the girls just love seeing their drawings animated in different ways - it really brings them to life 😍
.
.
